## Plots

Notice in the plot below, the use of `fig.showtext=TRUE`. This is required in order to match fonts (Merriweather and Source Sans Pro) used in the document with your ggplots.

```{r plot-1, fig.showtext=TRUE}
library(ggplot2)
p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, wt)) +
  geom_point() + ggtitle("MPG vs Weight from mtcars")
p
```
